divs: sighting detailsmy girlfriend and i were up late after having some friends over when we decided to have our last smoke for the night. we went to the laundry room and propped open the door as always. my g\f was looking at the stars when she smiled and said she saw a shooting star. i quickly looked as we had seen them together before, and when i did i noticed another "shooting star". i thought to myself this was impossible, and kept looking. we both witnessed both "star like" shapes of bright flying lights or orbs moving quickly in quick rapid movements up, down, left, right... diagonal... faster than any plane i've watched, and i'm a big plane watcher! eventually because it was so cold we both decided to go in, then i changed my mind and kept watching alone when both star like flying lights or orbs or whatever disappeared one by one into the same spot in the sky. it was strange and we are not people that think of ufo's, aliens, or any of that.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Stanhope
This sighting has never been favorited.
